summary: This is an internal FBI email from July 2019 discussing the creation of a victim questionnaire for the Epstein case to be posted on the FBI website. It shows the FBI was actively seeking to identify additional victims.

persons.name: SSA
persons.context: Mentioned as the person the email sender just spoke to regarding creating a victim questionnaire for the Epstein case.

events.title: FBI Discussion on Victim Questionnaire
events.description: Internal FBI email exchange about creating a victim questionnaire for the Epstein case to post on the FBI website.

keyFacts: The FBI was actively working to identify additional victims in the Epstein case as of July 2019.
The agency planned to create and post a victim questionnaire on the FBI website.
This document shows ongoing investigative efforts after Epstein's 2019 arrest.
